EmailTemplate.subject: Business Data Lake: A New Approach to Data Access and Analytics
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Business Data Lake <http://www.gopivotal.com/c/big-data/build-your-business-data-lake?utm_source=CIO-webcast&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=pivotal-email1-CIO-chunyun-bigdata-nurture-q22014> promises to increase the amount of data being captured and stored using Hadoop, and more importantly increase the amount of data being analyzed and operationalized within the business â€“ turning insight into action.
As part of our "What You Can Do With Hadoop" webinar series, Pivotal introduced one of the core components of the Business Data Lake with the recent release of Pivotal HD, our enterprise distribution of Hadoop. We invite you to view the replay <http://www.gopivotal.com/c/big-data/build-your-business-data-lake?utm_source=CIO-webcast&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=pivotal-email1-CIO-chunyun-bigdata-nurture-q22014>, covering our recent enhancements in providing more powerful and high performing analytics and real-time processing.
Build Your Business Data Lake to:
- Address IT infrastructure challenges - Store all of your data in one place at an affordable price - Access company data in real-time - Create a global view of your business - Increases top line revenue
Watch the replay now <http://www.gopivotal.com/c/big-data/build-your-business-data-lake?utm_source=CIO-webcast&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=pivotal-email1-CIO-chunyun-bigdata-nurture-q22014> to learn about unlocking Hadoop for next generation analytic intelligence.
